name: RedHanded: Investigations
description:
From one of the creators of Yokotroit comes a short Murder Mystery investigation game where you take on the role of detective and find the culprit.

Overview:

Red Handed Investigations is a mystery game where you play as a detective trying to solve the murder of James Charles by exploring the crime scene. At any time you can interrogate the five suspects, trying to pry details out of them that will help you solve the case. After you interrogate someone, you have access to their fingerprints to scan on objects around the crime scene. When you come to your own conclusions, you can arrest your number one suspect. Will you get the right person?

Controls:

Keyboard and mouse are required to play.
